text: The 2016–17 Ural season is the club's 4th successive season that the club will play in the Russian Premier League, the highest tier of association football in Russia. ==Squad== (captain) ===Youth team=== As per Russian Football Premier League. ==Transfers== ===Summer=== In: Out: ===Winter=== In: Out: ==Competitions== ===Russian Premier League=== ====Results by round==== ====Matches==== ====League table==== ===Russian Cup=== ====Final==== ==Squad statistics== ===Appearances and goals=== |- |colspan="14"|Players away from the club on loan: |- |colspan="14"|Players who appeared for Ural Yekaterinburg no longer at the club: |} ===Goal Scorers=== {| class="wikitable" style="font- size: 95%;
